description.hltext_display: 日雜誌擅登寫真照 綾瀨遙等21女星提告
description.content:
綾瀨遙等21名日本偶像女星，20日控告東京笠倉出版社侵犯肖像權。（圖╱翻攝自網路）
影劇中心╱綜合報導
綾瀨遙、深田恭子、AKB48的成員前田敦子等21名日本偶像女星，20日控告東京笠倉出版社並索賠總計2300萬日元，原因是該出版社未經允許將其照片等刊登在雜誌上，該行為侵犯了她們的肖像權。
日本《共同社》報導，21人所在的14家經紀公司，在參加日本音樂公司協會時公佈上述消息。涉案雜誌為《ENJOY MAX》相關的5本，協會方面認為，「包括引用過去的寫真集和凹版照片（攝影與凹雕版畫製作結合而製作的照片）和私人照片，幾乎全部都由未經允許擅自刊登的照片組成。」
協會表示，「對於這種利用明星的讀者號召力，擅自使用其姓名和照片的侵犯肖像權行為，將拿出強硬的態度。」笠倉出版社方面對此則表示「暫不作評論。」
原告方代表深田恭子透過協會發表評論說，「擅自使用我們的肖像並在我們不知道的地方出售，這種情況不能允許。希望這種性質惡劣的行為能被杜絕。」

description.hltext_display: Digital Lumens tapped to supply Intelligent Lighting System for U.S. Cold Storage
description.content:
nited States Cold Storage, Inc., a leading refrigerated storage and logistics companies, has selected and deployed the Digital Lumens Intelligent Lighting System in its Hazleton, Pennsylvania facility, Digital Lumens announced.
The new lighting system costs 3.5 cents per square foot per year, compared to 46 cents per square foot for traditional alternatives, according to the company. With its low kWh consumption, the Digital Lumens system generates 93 percent less carbon dioxide than traditional systems, and the LightRules lighting management software provides detailed operational reports on daily kWh usage and facility occupancy patterns.
USCS worked with Groom Energy Systems, an energy efficiency consulting firm and Digital Lumens reseller, on the project, and expects a return on investment of 14.6 months. PPL Corporation, the local utility, provided the project incentive.
Digital Lumens develops LED-based Intelligent Lighting Systems that reduce industrial customers' lighting-related electricity expenses up to 90 percent and transform lighting into a managed asset, improving efficiency, control and operational insight. For more on the company, see its Web site.

description.hltext_display: 银行理财产品坚持短期稳健
description.content:
接近年尾，市场上银行理财产品走俏的依然是短期 (一年期以内)、稳健型。 “因为如果要博取很高的收益，一般市民都会选择涉股的基金产品或者索性自己炒股票，买银行理财还是主要为了抵御通胀，而现在大多数银行的理财产品三个月期的都能达到银行一年期定存利率水平。 ”光大银行黄浦支行的一位客户经理告诉记者。他同时透露，估计各大银行都会对客户投入资金量的多少给予一些区别对待。工行南京西路支行的理财师也预计：“由于加息预期仍然在，银行明年主推的产品应该仍然是短期稳健型的。 ” 金融界网站的统计数据也印证了市场人士的判断，在上周发行的181只银行理财产品中，组合投资类理财产品发行数量占总发行量的37.02%，共发行67只，发行数量仍居首位；处在第二位的是债券投资类理财产品，发行数量为50只，占总体发行数量的27.62%；处于发行数量第三位的是票据类理财产品，发行数量43只，占总体发行数量的23.76%。稳健型投资产品占据主体地位的发行格局未见改变。
而从投资期限的分布来看，上周发行的理财产品中，1个月以下的理财产品，发行数量为60只，占总发行量的33.15%；1-3个月理财产品，发行数量为44只，占总发行量的24.31%；3-6个月的理财产品，发行数量为 35只，占总发行量的19.34%；6-12个月理财产品，本周发行41只，占总发行量的22.65%；24个月以上理财产品本周发行1只。本周3个月以内的短期理财产品占比仍将近六成，短期理财产品继续占据发行主体地位。
值得注意的是，从发行机构来看，上周北京银行发行数量最多，取代了一直排在首位的交通银行，北京银行发行产品31只，占总体发行数量的17.13%；发行数量第二位的是交通银行，本周发行产品30只，占总体发行量的16.57%；排在第三名的是中国银行，发行产品27只，占总体发行数量的14.92%；兴业银行、华夏银行和汇丰银行发行数量较少，分别发行1只产品。
从本周到期产品的收益率来看，南京银行发行的“聚喜(1004期IV)”人民币6个月期银行间市场投资理财产品到期收益率为2.8%，排在首位。(崔烨)

description.hltext_display: Alejandro, aprende a escribir
SolarBlue chosen to power Philadelphia Eagles stadium with renewable energy
description.content:
he Philadelphia Eagles recently announced plans to power Lincoln Financial Field with a combination of onsite wind, solar and dual-fuel generated electricity, making it the world's first major sports stadium to convert to self-generated renewable energy, according to the Eagles, via a report from the U.S. Office of Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy (EERE).
The franchise has contracted with SolarBlue, a renewable energy and energy conservation company, to install the system. The planned design includes approximately eighty 20-foot spiral-shaped wind turbines on the top rim of the stadium; 2,500 solar panels on the stadium's façade; a 7.6-megawatt (MW) onsite dual-fuel cogeneration plant; and a monitoring and switching technology to operate the system. The completion goal is September 2011.
SolarBlue will invest more than $30 million to build out the project, and will maintain and operate the stadium's power system for the next 20 years at a fixed percent annual price increase in electricity. The football franchise will save an estimated $60 million in energy costs.
The partners also project that Lincoln Financial Field will provide 1.039 billion kWh of electricity, enabling an estimated 4 MW of excess energy off-peak to be sold back to the local electric grid. Solar Blue estimates that converting the stadium to renewable energy will generate electricity comparable to the annual usage of 26,000 homes, and eliminate CO2 emissions equivalent to the consumption of 500,000 barrels of oil, equal to the removal of carbon emissions of 41,000 cars each year.
SolarBlue has more photos and information available on its Web site.

description.hltext_display: Sorge um inhaftierte Mönche in Tibet
description.author: redaktion@ad-hoc-news.de
description.content: In Tibet wächst die Sorge um drei prominente buddhistische Mönche, die seit den Unruhen im Frühjahr 2008 inhaftiert sind. Der Aufenthaltsort und der Gesundheitszustand der Männer seien unklar, teilte die Internationale Kampagne für Tibet (ICT) am Mittwoch mit.

description.hltext_display: 商务部预计全年实际使用外资1000亿美元 增11%
description.content:
.h1 } .h2 } .h3 } DIV.union } DIV.union TD } 中新网12月22日电 据商务部网站消息，为期两天的2010年全国商务工作会议在北京开幕。商务部部长陈德铭在《转变发展方式提高发展质量确保“十二五”商务事业开好局起好步》的工作报告中表示，预计全年实际使用外资1000亿美元左右，增长11%。
陈德铭指出，会同有关部门认真落实国务院《关于进一步做好利用外资工作的若干意见》，制定配套政策，对于改善投资环境、稳定外商投资信心发挥了重要作用。针对国外质疑我投资环境等情况，主动宣传我对外开放的基本国策，多渠道、多形式做好外商关注的自主创新、政府采购和知识产权保护等问题的增信释疑工作。加强外资投向引导，推动符合条件的省级开发区升级，加大对西藏、新疆产业园区建设的支持力度。
陈德铭表示，预计全年实际使用外资1000亿美元左右，增长11%。落实支持服务外包发展的各项政策，承接国际服务外包继续快速发展。
据介绍，本次会议的主要任务是全面贯彻党的十七大和十七届三中、四中、五中全会精神，认真落实中央经济工作会议部署，回顾总结2010年及“十一五”时期的商务工作，深入分析面临的国际国内形势，研究部署2011年的商务工作，探讨未来五年商务事业发展的基本思路。
（责任编辑：梁靖雪）

description.hltext_display: Green Energy Management to provide water efficiency, maintenance to Keystone Holdings
description.content:
reen Energy Management Services Holdings, Inc. announced it has signed a five-year water efficiency installation and maintenance contract with Keystone Holdings, a residential and commercial real estate developer, located in Miami, Florida. The Contract entails installing and maintaining AIRLOCK valves across the company's 14 properties, beginning with Keystone Palms, a residential property in Miami.
The Contract is estimated to provide Keystone Holdings with as much as 30 percent annual savings in its water and sewer costs at each of its properties. As compensation, the Company will receive 50 percent of the savings over the life of the contract.
AIRLOCK is a proprietary, patent-pending device that more accurately measures water flow from a water provider. Air typically accumulates in water pipes before it reaches the meter, artificially raising meter readings. AIRLOCK compresses the accumulated air in the pipes. The water then flows through the meter with the air undetected, and the result is a reduced water bill.
Green Energy Management Services Holdings, Inc. is a full service, national energy management company. GEM provides its clients all forms of energy efficiency solutions mainly based in three functional areas: energy efficient lighting upgrades, renewable energy generation and efficient water utilization.

description.hltext_display: Doğanşehir'de Aşure Etkinliği Yapıldı
description.content: Doğanşehir Kaymakamlığı önderliğinde ilçede Muharrem ayı nedeniyle aşure etkinliği düzenlendi. Tüm köy muhtarları, belediye başkanları, sivil toplum kuruluşları ve ilçe milli eğitim müdürlüğü katkıları ile yapılan aşure günü etkinliğine katılım yüksek oldu. Doğanşehir Hükümet Konağı bahçesinde başlayan aşure etkinliğinde gelen misafirlere aşureleri Vaizoğulları Anadolu Sağlık Meslek Lisesi öğrencileri ikram ederken, daha sonra Kaymakam Barboros Baran, Belediye Başkanı İbrahim Karaman, Cem Vakfı Malatya şubesi Başkanı Eşref Doğan, Malatya İl Müftüsü Hacı Yusuf Gül, Hacı Bektaş Veli Kültür Dayanışma Merkezi Vakfı Başkanı Hasan Meşeli ve diğer misafirler birlikte aşure dağıttı. Aşure dağıtımı sonrasında Belediye düğün salonunda Muharrem ayının anlam ve önemini anlatan panel düzenlendi. Panelde konuşmacı olarak Cem Vakfı Malatya şubesi Başkanı Eşref Doğan, Malatya İl Müftüsü Hacı Yusuf Gül, Hacı Bektaş Veli Kültür Dayanışma Merkezi Vakfı Başkanı Hasan Meşeli, İnönü Üniversitesi Öğretim Üyesi Doç. Dr. Mehmet Dönmez yer aldı. Doğanşehir Kaymakamı Barboros Baran, panelin açılışında yaptığı konuşmada, birlik ve beraberliğin pekiştiren bu günlerin önemine dikkat çekerek, aşure günü etkinliğine katkıda bulunanlara, katılımcılara ve ilçe halkına teşekkürlerini ilettti. (OKT-AY-ÜNS) - MALATYA (Anadolu Ajansı) 15 dakika önce.. [2430012]

description.hltext_display: 合庫寒假育樂營明年元月24日起在台東等地陸續展開
description.content:
合庫寒假育樂營自明年元月24日起，在台東、台北、台南等地陸續展開，活動為期5天，報名資格為國小三至六年級學童，報名方式採現場報名，額滿為止。
合庫現有棒球、桌球、羽球3支球隊歷史悠久，其中桌球隊成立於民國36年，目前主力球員有莊智淵、蔣澎龍、江宏傑、吳志祺、陳建安、黃怡樺、陳怡靜等人，棒球隊成立於民國37年，是目前台灣歷史最悠久的甲組成棒隊，羽球隊主力球員李勝木、方介民、周天成。
合庫表示，棒球營明年元月24日至28日在台東舉辦，桌球營元月25日至29日在台北舉辦，羽球營2月8日至12日在台南舉辦。

description.hltext_display: Ashton Kutcher getuige in moordzaak ex-vriendin
description.content:
LOS ANGELES - Ashton Kutcher zal in de rechtbank vragen moeten beantwoorden over zijn vermoorde ex-vriendin. Seriemoordenaar Michael Gargiulo staat terecht wegens de moord op meerdere vrouwen, waaronder Ashtons ex Ashley Ellerin. Zij kwam negen jaar geleden op gruwelijke wijze door 35 messteken om het leven.
Ashton miste op de avond dat ze werd vermoord zijn afspraak met Ashley. De acteur heeft toen nog door het raam van haar huis gekeken. Hij had echter niet in de gaten dat de plas rode wijn eigenlijk het bloed van zijn ex was. De acteur nam aan dat Ashley uit woede een fles wijn had stukgeslagen en is toen naar huis teruggekeerd. De moordenaar was een bekende in de buurt. Hij zou ook twee andere vrouwen hebben vermoord.

description.hltext_display: 贵州规定领导干部未完成招商引资任务将受处罚
description.content:
.h1 } .h2 } .h3 } DIV.union } DIV.union TD } 据中广网报道，近日，贵州省委办公厅、省政府办公厅印发了《贵州省领导干部带头招商引资的考核及奖惩办法(暂行)》，明确要求领导干部要带头招商引资。经考核后，对招商引资任务完成好、成绩突出的领导干部除给予表彰和奖励外，还要提高政治待遇，特别优秀的，要予以重用；对没有完成年度目标任务的，要通报批评；对连续2年未完成目标任务的，要进行戒勉谈话；对连续3年未完成目标任务的，要适时调整工作岗位。
（责任编辑：王炬鹏）

description.hltext_display: Lululemon voluntarily withdraws certain reusable bags over lead concerns
description.content:
The Canadian Press
VANCOUVER - Canadian yoga retailer Lululemon Athletica is voluntarily withdrawing certain reusable bags from its stores over concern they may contain lead.
Lululemon (TSX: LLL) says there is no concern with the use of the bag, only a potential concern with its proper disposal after use.
It says the recall of the bags, known as shoppers, follows recent discussions among other retailers over the proper disposal of reusable bags.
The shoppers are distributed free of charge to the customers with their purchases.
Luluemon CEO Christine Day says all available research indicates these bags "comply with all applicable health and safety regulations and are safe for our guests’ use."
Day says the bags at issue were obtained from a new supplier, that she did not name, and have only been distributed in stores within the last year.
"We choose our partners carefully and the manufacturer of the shoppers is known for its green practices, and is co-operating fully with our review," Day said in a news release.
"While we conduct that review, we believe that from a long-term environmental perspective it is better to stop distributing these bags. Our guests will be provided with shoppers from other manufacturers that do not raise potential environmental concerns.”
The discontinued bags were distributed between Nov. 1, 2009 and Dec. 18, 2010.
The distributed bags in Canada were:
— Ambassador Shopper — Small (English and French)
— Ambassador Shopper — Large (English and French)
— ivivva athletica shopper
The distributed bags in the U.S. were:
— Red Manifesto Shopper - Small
— Red Manifesto Shopper - Large
The bags distributed online were:
— E-commerce Shopper - Small
— E-commerce Shopper - Large
Any customers who received one of the bags can return them for a replacement or appropriate disposal at any of the retailer's stores.
For those who made an online purchase and received a discontinued bag, they are asked to call Lululemon's Guest Education Centre at 1-877-263-9300 ext. 2 for a shipping label to return the bag by posted mail.
A list of all affected shoppers and more information will be provided atwww.lululemon.com/shoppers
Content Provided By Canadian Press.

description.hltext_display: 圖╱「做愛看光光」 徐至琦情慾照被翻出
description.content:
徐至琦被週刊爆料，翻出過去《第一手報導》中疑似是她的女女慾照。(圖╱翻攝壹週刊)
影劇中心╱綜合報導
近來話題不斷的徐至琦，22日又被週刊爆料，翻出她過去的「女女艷照」，2007年10月出刊的《第一手報導》斗大的標題寫著「小蔡淑臻洩春光」，裡頭報導使用的文字相當露骨，寫道「涉嫌冒用名模蔡淑甄名義賣淫的徐姓女模…有疑似蕾絲邊女同志的親密照。」對於傳聞，徐至琦僅說「網路上那些不真實的東西不予回應。」
徐至琦近來因整形話題、上節目與前輩互嗆等風波，讓她聲名大噪，現在更被週刊爆料，指出有讀者拿出過去她在《第一手報導》雜誌中，被刊出與女同志的情慾照，照片中的女同志大膽緊掐徐至琦「雙峰」，讓人看了臉紅心跳。
▼徐至琦被週刊爆料，翻出過去疑似是她在《第一手報導》中的情慾照。(圖╱翻攝壹週刊)
種種報導都直指她而來，日前徐至琦也自爆自己還是「處女」，讓許多網友都相當不以為意，更說「早就看過她的口X照！」面對許多風波，徐至琦表示自己的照片資料常被盜用、合成，「這都不是真的」；至於有讀者提供《第一手報導》中的親熱照，她則冷淡表示「不回應網路上那些不真實的東西。」

description.hltext_display: Samsun ve Maraş'ta iki feci kaza: 6 ölü
description.content:
KAHRAMANMARAŞ'TA İKİ KAMYON KAFA KAFAYA ARPIŞTI: 4 L, 1 YARALI Kahramanmaraş'ta iki kamyonun kafa kafaya arpışması sonucu meydana gelen trafik kazasında 4 kişi hayatını kaybetti, 1 kişi ağır yaralandı. Alınan bilgiye gre kaza, sabah saat 06.00 sıralarında Kahramanmaraş-Kayseri Karayolu 6. kilometresinde meydana geldi. Yol yapım alışmaları nedeniyle trafiğin tek şeritten sağlandığı yolda, Kayseri ynne gitmekte olan Enver Bayırlı (31) ynetimindeki 31 HV 352 plakalı kamyon ile Kahramanmaraş istikametine giden Ali Dmbek'in (52) kullandığı 46 P 6310 plakalı kamyon kafa kafaya arpıştı. Kazada, kamyon srcs Dmbek ile yanında bulunan Hseyin Erko, Hanifi Cansu ve henz ismi belirlenemeyen bir kişi hayatını kaybetti. Kamyon ierisinde sıkışan diğer src Enver Bayırlı ise olay yerine gelen itfaiye ekiplerinin alışması sonucu ıkartılarak Kahramanmaraş Devlet Hastanesi'ne kaldırıldı.
Kazada hayatını kaybedenler otopsi iin morga kaldırılırken, Bayırlı'nın tedavisi sryor. Bu arada, kazanın ardından adeta savaş alanına dnen yolda, kamyonlarda bulunan yemler yola savruldu. Kaza nedeniyle Kahramanmaraş-Kayseri Karayolu uzun sre trafiğe kapanırken, karayolları ve itfaiye ekipleri ile polislerin yolda yaptığı alışmanın ardından kamyonlar yoldan ekilerek ulaşım başladı.
Kazayla ilgili soruşturma devam ediyor. YOLCU OTOBS YAYA ST GEİDİNİN AYAĞINA ARPTI: 2 L, 23 YARALI Samsun'da yolcu otobsnn yaya st geidin ayağına arpması sonucu meydana gelen trafik kazasında 2 kişi ld, 23 kişi yaralandı. Kazada otobsn iinde sıkışan yolcuları kurtarma alışmalarında adeta can pazarı yaşandı. Kaza, Tekkeky ilesi Selyeri Mahallesi Atatrk Bulvarı zerine Samsun-Ordu Karayolu'nda gece saat 04.00 sıralarında meydana geldi. Edinilen bilgiye gre, Adapazarı'ndan Trabzon'un Of ilesine giden Mustafa Hasanoğlu (46) idaresindeki yolcu otobs, direksiyon hakimiyetinin kaybedilmesi sonucu yoldan ıkarak yaya st geidin ayağına arptı. Kazada, otobsn muavini Celal Yazıcı (25) olay yerinde, yolculardan Meryem Taşkan (50) ise kaldırıldığı Samsun Eğitim ve Araştırma Hastanesi'nde hayatını kaybetti. Kazanın ardından olay yerine ok sayıda ambulans ve sağlık grevlileri, Samsun Sivil Savunma Arama Kurtarma Birliği ekipleri ve Samsun Bykşehir Belediyesi İtfaiye Daire Başkanlığı ekipleri sevk edildi. Kazada adeta can pazarı yaşandı. Otobsn iinde sıkışan yaralılar, sivil savunma ve itfaiye ekipleri tarafından glkle kurtarıldı. Kazada yaralanan otobs srcs Mustafa Hasanoğlu ile zgr Kartal (30), Ceyda Kartal (3), Muzaffer ztrk (46), zgr Kuleyin (26), Elmas Talanoğlu (60), Ali Osman Berber (50), Pakize Karaengel (39), Fatih Mustafa Yağcı (35), Mustafa Elmacı (37), Ekrem Dere (53), Ecehan Demir (10) ve Serpil Taşkın (8) Gazi Devlet Hastanesi'nde, Mesut Kalaycı (71), Fatma Şahin (34), Hilal Şahin (6 aylık), Temel Şahin (7), Veysel Nar (53), Saime zer (66), zcan Dutar (28), Zelife Hasanoğlu (58), Mehmet Hasanoğlu (59) ve Cihan Armağan (10) Samsun Eğitim ve Araştırma Hastanesi'ne kaldırılarak tedavi altına alındılar. Kazada len Celal Yazıcı'nın cesedi otopsi iin Tekkeky Ailesi Sağlı Merkezi morguna kaldırıldı.Otobsn arpmasıyla yaya geidin merdivenleri paralanarak askıda kalırken, otobste ise byk apta maddi hasar meydana geldi. Kazayla ilgili soruşturma srdrlyor. İHA

description.hltext_display: 新疆实施免费师范生改革试点 解决双语师资短缺
description.content:
.h1 } .h2 } .h3 } DIV.union } DIV.union TD } 中新网12月22日电 教育部今日在其官方网站公布了新疆维吾尔自治区实施师范生免费教育改革试点实施方案。方案指出，从根本上解决新疆维吾尔自治区农村中小学和学前“双语”师资短缺问题，大力提高农村中小学“双语”教学质量，吸引和鼓励更多优秀青年报考师范专业。 新疆维吾尔自治区实施师范生免费教育改革试点的总体目标是：落实教育优先发展的战略地位，从根本上解决新疆维吾尔自治区农村中小学和学前“双语”师资短缺问题，大力提高农村中小学“双语”教学质量，吸引和鼓励更多优秀青年报考师范专业，促进高等教育入学机会公平，促进基础教育健康发展。
该试点的阶段目标为：2010年至2013年，每年招收6000名师范类专业免费师范生；2011年-2012年，对2008-2009年招收的已在校的师范生，纳入非定向就业免费师范生管理之中。
为落实该试点方案，新疆维吾尔自治区先期已采取一系列改革措施。从2007年起，自治区在“定向汉语师资班”和“汉语师资定向就业计划”的基础上，启动实施南疆四地州乡镇中小学“"双语"教师特培计划”， 2009年特培计划在数量上增加至1100名，2010年自治区六所师范类院校承担6000名本、专科层次免费师范生培养任务，1100名自治区农村“双语”教师特培计划特培生纳入定向就业的免费师范生。免费师范生招生计划列入自治区本、专科零批次录取。
为顺利推进该项改革试点，新疆维吾尔自治区将出台一系列配套政策：免费师范生招生计划面向全区考生，定向就业的免费师范生计划(农村“双语”教师特培计划)优先招收定向就业地(州、市)的生源，优先招收“双语”教学重点推进地区的生源，以招收汉语言、民考汉和“双语”班学生为主。自治区设立免费师范生计划专项资金，全额承担免费师范生在校期间的学费、教材费、住宿费和实习支教等相关费用。
该试点方案的有效实施，需要充分的保障条件：其一，组织保障。在自治区人民政府的领导下,成立自治区免费师范生工作领导小组，履行职责，加强协调，确保培养计划顺利实施；其二，经费保障。自治区财政按照各年度各专业招生人数，按学制、培养层次分年度向承担培养任务的院校拨付经费。
该试点方案的进度安排如下：2010年招收6000名师范类专业免费师范生；2011年招收6000名师范类专业免费师范生，将2008年招收的已在校的师范生，纳入非定向就业免费师范生管理之中；2012年招收6000名师范类专业免费师范生，将2009年招收的已在校的师范生，纳入非定向就业免费师范生管理之中；2013年招收6000名师范类专业免费师范生。
免费师范生招生计划基本覆盖了六所承担师范类专业招生的院校，但也有院校未能完全覆盖师范类专业，造成了学校的师范类专业中存在免费与非免费、语种之间存在不均衡的现象。同时，由于定向就业的免费师范生计划(农村“双语”教师特培计划)与非定向就业的免费师范生招生计划优惠政策基本相同，也造成了定向就业的免费师范生招生计划的完成率可能会降低。针对以上问题，要求学校做好免费师范生招生计划的政策宣传工作，做好对学生的解释工作，同时根据学校的实际情况，做好学校的专业以及语种的调整工作。 media_span_url('http://www.chinanews.com.cn/edu/2010/12-22/2738939.shtml')
（责任编辑：梁靖雪）

description.hltext_display: Road shutdowns hinder path to mounting powder
description.author: Kieran Nicholson
description.content:
A large, growing blanket of fresh mountain snow is beckoning to skiers if only they can get there.
Another 2 to 3 feet of snow is expected in Colorado's central mountains today on top of 2 to 4 feet that has fallen on most areas there since Sunday, according to the National Weather Service.
A winter-storm warning remains in effect for most of western Colorado until 5 p.m. Thursday, with wind gusts of more than 30 mph near the Continental Divide, forecasters warned Tuesday night.
Travelers are being told to stay home, if possible, until the latest round of Pacific storms passes.
The storm so far has generated avalanches, scores of fender-benders and long delays. Interstate 70 near the Eisenhower Colorado Weather Colo. weather warnings & watches
Colorado Weather Forecast + Conditions Colorado Weather Alert Map Colorado Weather Radar Colorado Weather News School Closings, Delays Colorado Ski Resort Snow Totals Weather Photos + Video
Share your weather video Share your CO weather photos, and view them online Denver Webcams Weather on Twitter
Follow Denver Weather on twitter More Colorado Weather twitterers Travel Information
Denver Traffic Conditions CDOT Advisories, Cameras DIA Flight Information DIA Parking Space Availability Tunnel was closed for hours after a tow truck rear-ended a tanker, spilling 50 gallons of blasting gel.
The eastbound lanes were closed for about four hours, but the westbound lanes remained closed late into the night, with detours over Loveland Pass, which had been closed for several hours Tuesday for avalanche mitigation.
The spill closed the interstate from the Eisenhower Tunnel to the Dillon-Silverthorne exit, and cautious crews retreated about one-third of a mile from the spill because static electricity on the cold day could have sparked an explosion, even though the material was considered stable.
Hazardous-material experts from the Colorado State Patrol and Summit County cleaned up the spill.
The State Patrol said the tanker involved in the spill was using I-70 instead of Loveland Pass, the usual route for hazardous cargo, because the pass was closed at the time.
The tanker was carrying an estimated 40,000 pounds of the explosive gel, which is the consistency of applesauce, said Lake Dillon Fire Rescue spokesman Steve Lipsher.
State Trooper Nate Reid said both the tow-truck and tanker drivers were injured and taken to Summit Medical Center in Frisco.
An avalanche warning Colorado Ski Report Colorado Skiing News Colorado Ski Guide 2010 Colorado Ski + Terrain Guides Sign up for our ski newsletter Colorado Ski Resort Web Feeds Colorado Recent Snow Report Colorado Deepest Snow Report Colorado Ski Resort Acres Open Report Blog: Outdoor Extremes Colorado Outdoor Extremes Reader Photos Colorado Ski Resort Weather remains in effect until noon today for much of high country. The Colorado Avalanche Information Center said the danger of slides is rated "high" in a swath from Pagosa Springs to the Wyoming state line.
Avalanche concerns closed Monarch Pass on Monday and for much of the day Tuesday, and Cameron Pass remained closed Tuesday night because of avalanche mitigation, according to the Colorado Department of Transportation.
Highway officials are warning holiday travelers headed to the high country not to set out without emergency supplies, such as extra water and blankets, in case they get stuck.
Ski resorts, meanwhile, are reveling in the snow, despite the slow journey faced by travelers trying to reach the powder.
On Monday and Tuesday, Silverton Mountain ski area received 38 inches of snow; Wolf Creek, 34 inches; Crested Butte, 27 inches; Loveland, 19 inches; and Arapahoe Basin, 17 inches, according to Colorado Ski Country USA.
"The snow is great for the resorts," said Jennifer Rudolph, spokeswoman for the trade group. "Snow management is one of the things resorts know how to do very well, and they're equipped to do it."
In Mount Crested Butte, a town at 9,400 feet elevation at the base of Crested Butte Mountain Resort, 53 inches of snow has fallen since Friday.
"It's been snowing a lot, but we're hanging in there," said Joe Fitzpatrick, town manager. "The roads are getting a little narrower; we just have to keep up with the plowing now."
Fitzpatrick said the snow was very wet Friday and over the weekend, but it dried out about Monday.
"We're very, very happy to have it," Fitzpatrick said. "We're definitely a winter wonderland. It's like living in a snow globe. We are looking forward to a great Christmas."
Snow continues to elude the metro region, which has received less than 2 inches so far this season, most of it falling Nov. 15, according to weather data.
Highs are expected to stay in the 40s through Christmas, although Denver has a 20 percent chance of snow Thursday night, when temperature sink into the low 20s.

description.hltext_display: 长沙白领热衷学唱歌 700元苦练一首“主打曲”
description.content:
客户非得去唱歌，可一首歌也唱不完整；单位年会大合唱，五音不全不敢开口；同事朋友去KTV，只有当听众的份……年底了，各种年会、应酬越来越多，为了能在各种场合“不掉链子”，最近，长沙很多公司的白领多了一门功课――花钱请家教学唱歌。 “我最怕去KTV，每次聚会或是跟客户应酬，都免不了要唱歌，每到这个时候都感觉很尴尬。”像小徇这样五音不全的人还不少，他说，自己已经在公众场合掉过很多次“链子”了。小徇想了很多办法，从电脑里下载歌曲没事就跟着唱、找歌唱得好的同事教，可成果一般。最后在朋友的推荐下，找到艺术培训学校的音乐家教学习。
这周末，小徇刚上完一期培训。“我参加了一个短期声乐培训班，才上完八个课时的课程，学好了一首歌。 ”小徇将学好的歌曲演唱给朋友们听，大家都连连惊叹进步神速，“看来，一首‘主打歌’花掉700元钱还值得。”
学歌热的兴起，让“声乐速成”培训在长沙悄然升温。记者了解到，这些培训机构多是请艺术院校的专业人士担任，学费基本在每小时80-100元之间。河西一家艺术培训机构的田老师告诉记者，一到年底，像小徇这种为了几首歌来参加声乐培训的成年人有不少，“年龄多在25岁到40岁之间，一般都是上班族，为了业务需要或者特定的表演而突击学唱歌。”三湘都市报-记者 黄静

description.hltext_display: Leylekler bu yıl Iğdır'da kaldı
description.content: Doğu Anadolu Blgesi'ndeki illerin oğunda soğuk hava etkili olurken Iğdır'da yazdan kalma gnler yaşanıyor. Sıcak havanın da etkisiyle, kentteki yaklaşık 100 leylek, bu yıl başka lkelere gitmedi. evre ve Orman İl Mdr Taner Tazegn, AA muhabirine yaptığı aıklamada, ''İlk defa bu kadar leylek sıcak lkelere g etmedi. nceki yıllarda sadece yaşlı ve g edemeyecek durumda olan birka leylek kalıyordu. Bu yıl 100'e yakın leylek hala kentimizde'' dedi. Tazegn, ''Hava sıcaklığı bu yıl mevsim normallerinin zerinde seyrediyor. Leylekler, kışın da ılık geeceğini dşndkleri iin gitmedi. Kentte fare sayısında bir artış oldu. Leyleklerin gitmemesini bir neden olarak da buna bağlayabiliriz. Bu saatten sonra da leyleklerin g etmeleri biraz zor olabilir. nk g edecekleri gzergahlarda soğuk hava etkili oluyor. Sadece Nahivan zerinden g edebilirler'' diye konuştu. AA

description.hltext_display: 贪官百字材料写错数十字 称真有文化早当副省长
description.content:
.h1 } .h2 } .h3 } DIV.union } DIV.union TD } 云南玉溪市交通运政管理处处长陈有云因严重违纪违法被“双开”，并移送司法机关查处。调查显示：陈有云在任职期间，集体私分国有资产493万余元，收受贿赂14万余元，滥用职权造成国家损失100多万元。这是玉溪近年来查办的一起影响极为恶劣的交通运政系统窝案，涉及人员有交通运政管理处处长、副处长及全市八县一区部分交通运政管理所所长、副所长。
据介绍，陈有云是从一名普通农民成长为国家官员的，他出生于1953年，幼年丧母在江川县一农村长大，没读几年小学就辍学在家。改革开放后，他经商办企业，开办砖厂，成为当地当时为数不多的万元户，后来担任村支书到乡长再到县交通局局长，走上仕途，1999年任玉溪市交通运政管理处处长。
玉溪市交通运政管理处在玉溪老百姓的眼中，是一个“油水十足”的部门，单位职工工资高、福利待遇好，没有关系和门路，要想进这个单位是很困难的。通过专案组深入调查了解到，陈有云在来到运政管理处任处长后，其文化低，威信也没有副处长的高，为在新的单位站稳脚跟、笼络人心，他就发挥其胆子大的“优点”，把触角伸到本单位成立的市交通行业技能培训站收取的培训费上。从2000年到2009年，他们单位技能培训站的收入达1700多万元人民币，而陈有云为了巩固其权威，就将处领导召集起来，研究怎样分钱，结果市交通运政管理处以“工资”、“目标责任奖”、“奖励基金”等十多种名目将近500万元公款私分，陈有云个人分得17.8万元。
陈有云通过弄虚作假，将妻子刘某某超龄招收为江川县运政所职工，且在清理超龄招收人员期间又将刘某某调到峨山县运政所，一年后办理了提前退休手续。他还动用关系网将才有15岁的儿子年龄改大后参军，为其转业后分到交通运政管理系统铺平道路。
陈有云牢牢掌握了全市运政系统的人事权和财权，任何事都是他一人说了算，为了掩饰自己的低文化，他还有了大学文凭。可在纪委对陈有云采取“双规”措施期间，这文凭就露馅了。陈有云所写的交代材料，一百个字就有数十个错别字。更让人啼笑皆非的是，专案组要求其写对错误行为的认识，有大学文凭的陈有云却久久不能落笔，后来苦苦要求办案人员代笔，并大言不惭地说：“我是能说不能写，如果我真有文化，早就当副省长了。”(据中国之声)
（责任编辑：王炬鹏）

description.hltext_display: 估值有支撑 大盘将在犹豫中上行
description.content:
尽管自11月17日以来，沪综指曾在盘中五次跌破2800点，但每次都会神奇的收回来，由此看，2800点具备较强支撑力度。短期来看，虽然市场难以出现大幅上涨，但在犹豫中保持上行将成为大概率事件。
本周“红色星期一”没有如期出现，是受到了意外扰动因素的影响。但既然是扰动因素，就注定不会持久，周二大盘走势表明短期利空影响基本结束，市场仍会维持原来的运行态势。
年底资金抽紧是压制市场走势的主要因素。比如准备金缴款日、年底结账回笼、IPO扩容加速等导致资金面突然收紧，加上市场对加息担忧有增无减，更加剧了资金面的紧缩预期。但我们认为，准备金缴款日已过，年内加息可能性不大。而且按照以往的经验，年底企业结账的时间节点是在12月25日。一旦过了这个点，市场的资金面就会有明显改观。
大盘在犹豫中上行，还基于年前基本面呈现小周期上升的特征。年底为完成年初所定各项经济指标，各方会有“冲刺”动作，促进经济继续回升，从前11个月的各项经济指标看也确实保持了较好水平。况且12月份的通胀水平由于翘尾因素显著下降和食品环比涨幅下降的共同作用而有望显著回落，这些都有利于市场企稳回升。 周二是一个敏感的时间窗口，以地产股为代表的大盘蓝筹股集体发力，大盘收出中阳线，基本覆盖前日阴线，止跌企稳信号强烈。我们认为，对于后市不必过分悲观，预计本周前半周大盘实现企稳后，后半周有可能继续回升。周五正好是时间节点的前一个交易日，应当是一个低吸的较好时机。
从市场整体估值水平看，目前正在历史平均估值的下沿。如果按2011年上市公司净利润增长15%计算，全部A股、沪深300指数的动态市盈率将降到大约17倍和13倍。更为重要的是，目前蓝筹股的走势都不强，很多品种股价再次回落到1668点的水平，估值水平也基本到达历史低位。此外，从目前已经公布的2010年业绩预告的700多家上市公司情况看，预喜公司占比接近八成，其中预计同比增幅有望翻番的公司达到139家，这些都成为股市向好的最根本支撑。
我们认为，2800点附近即使不是历史性大底，也有可能成为相当长时间内的底部区域，再继续往下大幅破位，则有诱空嫌疑。尽管短期市场暂时仍会维持“下有估值支撑，上有紧缩利空”的运行格局，但在估值较低、负利率背景下，A股市场中长期向好趋势不会改变，市场无太大的系统性风险。
在未来的投资机会方面，建议围绕十二五规划及相关政策，寻找明年的投资标的，包括：文化产业、环保产业中前期滞涨的个股，受明年大规模投资规划刺激的建材、机械设备、信息技术、高铁、新材料等新兴产业股，受千年寒与两大节日影响的煤炭资源股，受中央农村工作会议召开与“一号文件”将出台影响的农业与农业水利个股，盈利超预期伴随高送转预期的个股，以及主题投资中的并购重组题材股。 □银泰证券

description.hltext_display: 育てた米ですし作りに挑戦
description.content:
赤磐市町苅田の石相小で21日、近くの水田で児童らが栽培した米の収穫祭をした。
５年生23人が参加。地元の主婦ら４人から指導を受けながら祭りずし作りに挑戦。慣れぬ手つきで混ぜ込み用のニンジンやシイタケ、アナゴなど懸命に調理した。
同校は５年生を対象に総合学習の時間を利用し米作り。農家から借りた水田５アールで、苗育てから田植え、草取り、かかし製作、稲刈りなどの体験をした。

description.hltext_display: きょう冬至、暖かい朝に
description.content:
22日は１年で最も日が短い「冬至」。岡山市の日の出は午前７時８分、日の入りは午後４時58分で、日中の時間は９時間50分。同市のＪＲ岡山駅前では通勤・通学時間帯でも太陽の高度が低く、行き交う人たちの影がひときわ長く伸びた。
この日朝の瀬戸内地方は低気圧の影響で雲が広がっったため放射冷却が起きず、各地で最低気温は平年を５度以上上回った。岡山県和気町７・３度（平年氷点下１・２度）津山市６・９度（同０・８度）岡山市７・９度（平年２・３度）高松市10・０度（同２・５度）福山市６・３度（同０・９度）など。岡山、香川、広島県では10月下旬から11月下旬並みの暖かさだった。
岡山地方気象台は「24日ごろから寒気が入る。気温はぐんと下がり、しばらく寒さが続くだろう」と予報している。

description.hltext_display: 旧深柢小跡地 川崎病院移転を
description.content:
旧深柢小学校跡地（岡山市北区中山下）への移転建て替えを希望し、川崎病院（同所）を来春から運営する学校法人川崎学園（倉敷市松島）の川崎明徳理事長が22日、高谷茂男市長に跡地利用を求める要望書を提出した。要望を受けた後、市長は前向きに検討する姿勢で、本年度中にも結論を出す意向を示した。
学園側から５人が岡山市役所を訪れ、川崎理事長は「現在の建物は狭いうえ築後50年以上たち、近代的な医療の提供が難しい。市民が安心して暮らせる病院づくりのために跡地を利用させてほしい」と要望書を手渡した。
市長は「公共性を踏まえて考える。中心市街地から大きな病院がなくなりつつあり、歩いて行けるところに病院があるというのは市民にとっていいこと」と述べた。取材に市長は「要望を前向きに検討し、本年度中には結論を出したい」とした。
川崎病院は現在地での建て替えが難しいと判断し、跡地への移転建て替えを希望している。市議会が15日、跡地に同病院誘致を求める地元住民らの陳情を採択したことから、跡地を所有する市との交渉に乗り出した。
